title: FLIGHT
description: A modern, responsive React flight travel template designed for seamless flight search and booking. Features include intuitive forms, real-time flight results, and easy navigation.

title: eCommerce
description: An ecommerce platform built with Laravel and Livewire, offering real-time updates, seamless user interaction, and dynamic product management.

title: Portfolio
description: A modern portfolio built with React, showcasing projects, skills, and achievements with a responsive, interactive design.
